text: Plan a trip to Paris next month, about $2000 budget. I like museums and pastries.
Family vacation: 7 days in Tokyo in December, budget 5000 USD, kid-friendly activities.
Business trip to New York from London next week. No strict budget, but prefer 4-star hotels.
Weekend in Lagos, beach + nightlife, max $300 total.
Two weeks in Rome in spring. Cathedrals, art, and pasta. Budget around â‚¬2500.
Couples getaway to Zurich in January, skiing and fondue. Spend up to 1200 CHF.
